replies.msg:
丟你老母， 漏左本kindle係飛機， 搵客戶服務， 佢居然叫我去失物認領處攞翻

係土耳其機場個失物認領處。 痴撚線
畀人當波咁射

丟你老母， 漏左本kindle係飛機， 搵客戶服務， 佢居然叫我去失物認領處攞翻

係土耳其機場個失物認領處。 痴撚線


開間公司名啦


又或者打IDD過土耳奇

Lost & Found Items

The items lost by the passengers at the airports and multi-storey car park are kept at the Lost & Found Office in International Terminal Arrivals Floor which is open 7/24. The items found are stored and delivered in a systematical order.

The lost items brought to the depot can be delivered to their owners between the hours 09:00 – 16:00 on weekdays. For deliveries except these hours and days, please contact TAV Customer Relations directly at the phone number stated below.

TAV Customer Relations Call Center: +90 (212) 444 9 TAV (828)

丟你老母， 漏左本kindle係飛機， 搵客戶服務， 佢居然叫我去失物認領處攞翻

係土耳其機場個失物認領處。 痴撚線


開間公司名啦


又或者打IDD過土耳奇

Lost & Found Items

The items lost by the passengers at the airports and multi-storey car park are kept at the Lost & Found Office in International Terminal Arrivals Floor which is open 7/24. The items found are stored and delivered in a systematical order.

The lost items brought to the depot can be delivered to their owners between the hours 09:00 – 16:00 on weekdays. For deliveries except these hours and days, please contact TAV Customer Relations directly at the phone number stated below.

TAV Customer Relations Call Center: +90 (212) 444 9 TAV (828)

咪就係 Turkish airline.
我都唔算過份，問佢DHL，我俾錢得唔得，佢老母佢覆翻DHL個電話俾我。我點撚知佢土耳其機場個失物認領係邊q度呀。
